headline: Ask HN: What Happened to the Soylent Buzz?
description:
A few years ago, Soylent, and related local copies, were given a lot of press and were lauded as the future of eating.

Techies loved them, there were articles about Soylent all over HN. Soylent itself got backing by Alphabet and Anderseen Horowitz.

I haven't heard about Soylent that much lately, however, and the buzz (or hype?) seemed like it died off.

Reading an article on Yahoo! about them, it seems like they pivoted recently, with CEO from Kraft. Which made the company profitable for the first time.

https://finance.yahoo.com/news/soylent-once-beverage-tech-bros-143516284.html
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Soylent Buzz的情况如何？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Soylent Buzz的情況如何？
description_zh-Hans:
几年前，Soylent和相关的本地拷贝被大量报道，并被称赞为饮食的未来。

科技人员喜欢它们，HN上到处都是关于Soylent的文章。

我最近没怎么听说过Soylent了，而且这种喧嚣（或炒作）似乎已经消失了。

在雅虎上读了一篇关于他们的文章，似乎他们最近进行了调整，CEO来自卡夫。这使得该公司首次实现了盈利。

https://finance.yahoo.com/news/soylent-once-beverage-tech-bros-143516284.html
description_zh-Hant:
幾年前，Soylent和相關的本地拷貝被大量報道，並被稱讚為飲食的未來。

科技人員喜歡它們，HN上到處都是關於Soylent的文章。

我最近沒怎麼聽說過Soylent了，而且這種喧囂（或炒作）似乎已經消失了。

在雅虎上讀了一篇關於他們的文章，似乎他們最近進行了調整，CEO來自卡夫。這使得該公司首次實現了盈利。

https://finance.yahoo.com/news/soylent-once-beverage-tech-bros-143516284.html
